title: Status Effects
content: st. Newborn Gathering its bearings. Disadvantage on Attack Rolls, lowered Armour Class and Hit Points, and cannot take Reactions. Noxious Fumes Affected entity takes 1d4 Poison damage each turn. It must succeed a Constitution Saving Throw or take an additional 2d4 Poison damage, taking half damage in a success. Off Balance The effected entity has Disadvantage on Strength and Dexterity checks, and attack rolls against the entity have Advantage. Oil Flammable. Owlbear's Rage The Owlbear is enraged
